sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { CButton, CCard, CCardBody, CCardHeader, CCol, CForm, CFormGroup, CFormText, CTextarea, CInput, CLabel, CInvalidFeedback } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' const CreateNode = () => { const [appName, setAppName] = useState(""); const [hostName, setHostName] = useState(""); const [owner, setOwner] = useState(""); const [group, setGroup] = useState(""); const [groupMail, setGroupMail] = useState(""); const [desciption, setDesciption] = useState(""); const createNodeReq = async (e) => { let forms = document.querySelectorAll('.needs-validation') forms[0].classList.add('was-validated') const payload = { appName: appName, hostName: hostName, owner: owner, group: group, groupMail: groupMail, desciption: desciption } // call api /createNode } const resetForm = async (e) => { let forms = document.querySelectorAll('.needs-validation') forms[0].classList.remove('was-validated') setAppName(""); setHostName(""); setOwner(""); setGroup(""); setGroupMail(""); setDesciption(""); } return ( <> Create a new node createNodeReq(e)} onReset={(e) => resetForm(e)} className="form-horizontal needs-validation"> Application Name setAppName(e.target.value)} /> Please input a valid name. Host Name setHostName(e.target.value)} /> Please input a valid host name. App Owner setOwner(e.target.value)} /> Please input a valid owner. Group Name setGroup(e.target.value)} /> Please input a valid group name. Group Email setGroupMail(e.target.value)} /> Please provid a valid email address. Description setDesciption(e.target.value)} rows="3" /> Please input something.
Submit Reset
) } export default CreateNode
